items.text: much wider this time outside off and easier to let it go
items.shortText: Henry to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: pushed down the ground on the up and it stayed in the air for a bit but fell a few yards short of mid-on. Was angling in nicely from length towards middle stump
items.shortText: Henry to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: back to outside off, he waits on the back foot and defends towards point
items.shortText: Henry to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: bit too full this time, straight-bat drive and Henry stops in his follow through
items.shortText: Henry to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: thick edge and that rolls away to third man. It was on that good length outside off, tempted him to drive and he did away from his body to get a thick outside edge that was in the air for a bit
items.shortText: Henry to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: a bouncer to start the over that he ducks under early
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: short again, this time he pulls confidently and hard and it races away to a sliding Henry at fine leg
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: edged, doesn't carry and goes between the two slips for four! Boult pitched it up and probably had the batsman in tow minds but he used soft hands nicely to hardly give the ball distance and it fell short and wide of first slip
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: beats him outside off again! Much shorter this time, good pace, almost holds its line outside off and goes past the outside edge as he tries to defend on the back foot
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: nicely defended off the back foot to cover point this time from outside off
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: errs with the line on the last ball and it's four leg byes. Fullish and going down leg, he tries to flick but gets only the pad and the team will take those four extras on the last ball of the Powerplay
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, 4 leg byes

items.text: just back of length around off, he stays back and defends to leg
items.shortText: Henry to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: Colin de Grandhomme warming up a bit
items.text: pushes that straighter ball down towards mid-on with that flick-push Mushfiqur plays
items.shortText: Henry to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: dropped at midwicket! Short ball and Mushfiqur pulled that really hard to Todd Astle who put his hands up at the right time to his right above the shoulders but the ball went through them
items.shortText: Henry to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: in the air again, this time Soumya plays on the up but luckily for him it goes well over cover point for two
items.shortText: Henry to Soumya Sarkar, 2 runs

items.text: much more confident shot this time. He gets a full delivery just outside off and he waits before steering that between point and cover point by opening the face of the bat on the off side. Very nicely executed and he gets four
items.shortText: Henry to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: around the off stump and swinging in, he lets it go on the length
items.postText: 16 runs from the last two overs
items.shortText: Henry to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.preText: Boult continues with a leg gully
items.text: angling away from off stump, he leans into it a bit and pushes the ball into the covers
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: bit straighter this time on middle, he waits and defends it back nicely
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: short, pulled, and a one-bounce four! It wasn't a nasty short ball, rose just around chest height and Mushfiqur pivoted just enough on the back foot to send it in the air to the square-leg boundary. Didn't hit that very hard or it might have gone for six
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: swinging in a bit and Mushfiqur taps it to the leg side behind square
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full, outside off, opens the face of the bat to steer it to third man
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: good length again, swinging in from around off and it's pushed down to mid-on
items.postText: Jay : "Tuning in from the USA. I personally think that the way the New Zealand bowlers have threatened the Bangaldesh batsman with accuracy, pace, and swing, shows why they are some of the best fast bowling attacks in the world. If Bangladesh want to better in alien conditions, especially in the World Cup, they should work very hard on their batting technique against the moving ball. What do you think, Vishal?" That's true, although the pitches in England might be drier than this. Still, no harm in getting better against the fast and swing bowlers
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: First change of the morning - here's Colin de Grandhomme with one wide slip
items.text: starts with a wide down the leg side
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Soumya Sarkar, 1 wide

items.text: and another one, this one with more inswing and one more extra
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Soumya Sarkar, 1 wide
